channel.title: [PI]Making my client a .jar file and working![PI]
channel.description:
Okay, so I created my PI server into a .jar file by typing this in the cmd box:
cvfm SERVERNAME.java manifest.txt *.*
My manifest file has this in it: main-class: 1.Play Now .bat
I think i need to change the main-class, but what to?
The files get compressed correctly but when i go to run the file nothing happens.
Please help:)

item.title: [PI]Making my client a .jar file and working![PI]
item.dc:creator: @neonscapeftw neonscapeftw
item.description:
@neonscapeftw wrote:

Okay, so I created my PI server into a .jar file by typing this in the cmd box:

cvfm SERVERNAME.java manifest.txt .

My manifest file has this in it:
main-class: 1.Play Now .bat

I think i need to change the main-class, but what to?

The files get compressed correctly but when i go to run the file nothing happens.

Please help:)

Read full topic
